# AudioBufferResource

**Class**

An audio resource that you load from an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioBuffer].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency class AudioBufferResource
```

## Overview

Use the resource to create an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AudioPlaybackController] instance by calling an entity’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/prepareAudio(_:)] or [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/playAudio(_:)] function. The controller plays the audio from the location in space of the entity that created the controller.

## Creating an audio buffer resource

- **init(buffer:configuration:)**: Creates an `AudioBufferResource` with the given `AVAudioBuffer` and configuration.

## Describing the resource

- **configuration**: The configuration for this `AudioBufferResource`.
- **duration**: The duration of this `AudioBufferResource`.

## Supporting types

- **AudioBufferResource.Configuration**

## Deprecated

- **init(buffer:inputMode:shouldLoop:)**: Init an AudioBufferResource from an `AVAudioBuffer` instead of a file location. This is intended for use with `AVSpeechSynthesisVoice`.
- **shouldLoop**: Whether or not this file loops during playback. This should be set for assets that are prepared as seamless loops. A looping resource will play forever until it is explicitly told to stop.

## Audio resources

- **AudioFileResource**: An audio resource that you load from a file or from a URL.
- **AudioFileGroupResource**: An audio file group.
- **AudioLibraryComponent**: A container for audio resources that you can look up by user-defined names.
- **AudioResource**: A playable audio resource
- **AudioResource.Calibration**: A container for different calibration modes that can be applied for playback.
- **AudioResource.Normalization**: Normalization adjusts the level of an audio file or buffer to be at a defined target.

## Inherits From

- AudioResource

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Resource
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
